pullRequest.title: Improvements for Entry Preview (in the context of #7083 and in addition to #7093)
pullRequest.bodyText:
Improvements for integrity and coherence of the entry preview (in the context of #7083; in addition to #7093)

 Change in CHANGELOG.md described (if applicable)
 Tests created for changes (if applicable)
 Manually tested changed features in running JabRef (always required)
 Screenshots added in PR description (for UI changes)
 [Checked documentation]

commit.message:
Update JabRefPreferences.java

Modifications in Entry Preview (7093 and 7083)

nodes.bodyText: there is a= sign after the series, is that correct?
nodes.diffHunk:
